name: Union for Ethical BioTrade
membership: UEBT is a full member of the ISEAL Alliance.
goal:
UEBT is a non-profit association that promotes sourcing with respect. We support and verify companies’ commitments to innovation and sourcing that contribute to a world in which people and biodiversity thrive.

The mission of UEBT is to support and validate best practices of companies committed to ethical sourcing and innovation of natural ingredients for the benefit of people and biodiversity.

The vision of UEBT is: Companies’ innovation and sourcing of natural ingredients contribute to a world in which people and biodiversity thrive.

The Union for Ethical BioTrade is a member-based non-profit association. Our members are companies, trade associations, NGOs, and IGOs in the cosmetics, pharmaceuticals and food sector. UEBT members commit to gradually ensuring that their sourcing practices promote the conservation of biodiversity, respect traditional knowledge and assure the equitable sharing of benefits all along the supply chain.
euInitiatives: biodiversity, natural ingredients, Access and Benefit Sharing(ABS), Nagoya protocol, BioTrade
